parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS brake system can cause extended stopping distances, loss of braking ability, and increased risk of accidents, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle jerks or pulses when braking
the ABS light comes on
the brakes lock up
the vehicle experiences extended stopping distances
the brakes fail to work
and the vehicle lunges forward when the brake is applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The issues with the brake pedal can cause loss of braking ability, extended stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
and the brake pedal pulsates or jerks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS wheel sensor can cause the ABS brake system to malfunction, leading to extended stopping distances, loss of braking ability, and increased risk of accidents, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The ABS light comes on
the brakes lock up
the vehicle experiences extended stopping distances
and the ABS system fails to work.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defective engine gaskets can cause engine overheating, stalling, and damage to the engine, leading to costly repairs and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Engine overheating
stalling
high temperature gauge readings
engine noise
and excessive oil consumption.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cooling system failures can cause engine overheating, damage to the engine, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Upper radiator hose failure
thermostat failure
cooling fan malfunction
and engine overheating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or become inoperable, leading to potential safety risks and costly repairs.
symptoms: Engine locking up
engine stalling
excessive oil consumption
and engine noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Catalytic converter failure can cause a fire hazard, potentially leading to damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: Catalytic converter catching fire
console overheating
and smoke filling the interior of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose bolts within the steering column can cause the steering column and turn signal to become loose, leading to a loss of steering control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Steering column and turn signal become loose
bolts need to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden separation of the tie rod end can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: Tie rod end separates while driving
loss of steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower control arm can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: Lower control arm breaks while driving
loss of steering control
loss of vehicle control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Smoke coming from the steering column can indicate a serious electrical or mechanical issue, potentially leading to a loss of steering control or fire.
symptoms: Smoke comes from the steering column
smoke occurs when using the turn signal.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Power steering hose leaks can cause a loss of power steering fluid, leading to increased steering effort and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Power steering hose leaks
grinding noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Power steering pump failure can cause a loss of power steering assist, leading to increased steering effort and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Power steering pump makes grinding noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Abnormal noises from the steering column can indicate a mechanical issue, potentially leading to a loss of steering control or other safety concerns.
symptoms: Steering column makes noise when turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure Leading to Fires and Stalling
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause fires, stalling, and loss of control, which can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle catches on fire under the hood
smoke comes from the steering column
the vehicle stalls with unknown cause
the volt gauge drops to the red zone repeatedly
the starter fails
preventing the vehicle from starting or stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of electrical components in the steering column can cause fires, smoke, and loss of control, which can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Smoke comes from the steering column
the signal light switch shorts out
the steering column smokes while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the starter motor can cause the vehicle to stall or fail to start, which can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The starter motor fails
preventing the vehicle from starting or stalling
the starter motor is noisy.
